mapper.select:
select
from sk_topic_config where topic_type = 0
and topic_name like concat('%',#{topicName},'%')
order by id DESC

select
from sk_topic_config stc left join sk_topic_video stv on stc.id = stv.topic_id where stc.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
